channel.title: About on Leon Weber-Genzel
channel.description: Recent content in About on Leon Weber-Genzel

item.title: About
item.description: About me I am a post-doctoral researcher at MaiNLP where I work with Barbara Plank on human-centric NLP. I am also still interested in the application of NLP to the biomedical domain. Before that I was a PhD student at Humboldt University of Berlin and MDC Berlin where I worked on biomedical NLP with Ulf Leser and Jana Wolf. Before starting my PhD in 2018, I completed my MSc and BSc in Computer Science at Humboldt University and Free University in Berlin.

item.title: Publications
item.description: Selected publications For a full list of publications, please see my Google Scholar profile. 2023 L. Weber, B. Plank (2023). ActiveAED: A Human in the Loop Improves Annotation Error Detection. Findings of ACL 2023. [paper] [code] 2022 L. Weber, M. Sänger, S. Garda, F. Barth, C. Alt, U. Leser. (2022). Chemical–protein relation extraction with ensembles of carefully tuned pretrained language models. Database. [paper] [code] J.A. Fries*, L. Weber*, N. Seelam*, G.
